edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

Interface DlogBasedSigma

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaDHExtendedProverComputation, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalProverComputation, SigmaDHExtendedVerifierComputation, SigmaDHProverComputation, SigmaDHVerifierComputation, SigmaDlogProverComputation, SigmaDlogVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyProverComputation, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyVerifierComputation, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeVerifierComputation, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueVerifierComputation

    public interface DlogBasedSigma
    Marker interface. Every Sigma prover or verifier that consists of DlogGroup should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
